name: OpenClaw
author: Lumia Stream
description: Send prompts to an OpenClaw Gateway and use responses in Lumia templates via {{openclaw_prompt}} and related helpers.

settings.label: Gateway Token
settings.helperText: Optional. Required when Gateway auth is enabled.

settings.label: Default Agent ID
settings.helperText: Agent id used to build request route (openclaw:<agent>) and x-openclaw-agent-id.

settings.label: Known Agent IDs
settings.helperText: Comma-separated agent IDs for the dropdown (example: main,research,fast).

variableFunctions.label: OpenClaw Prompt
variableFunctions.description: Use {{openclaw_prompt=message|thread|agent}} to return a response from OpenClaw.

variableFunctions.label: OpenClaw One Line
variableFunctions.description: Use {{openclaw_one_line=message|thread|agent}} to return a single-line response.

variableFunctions.label: OpenClaw Clear Thread
variableFunctions.description: Use {{openclaw_prompt_clear=thread_name}} to clear a conversation thread.
